title: Misguided Boycotts Against Russian-Themed Businesses in the U.S. | Tiffanie Drayton
itunes:title: Misguided Boycotts Against Russian-Themed Businesses in the U.S. | Tiffanie Drayton
description:
President Biden declares Vladimir Putin a war criminal, Desi Lydic talks to restaurant owners affected by anti-Russian boycotts, and Tiffanie Drayton discusses "Black American Refugee."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
